questions.question: What specific policy requirement is being bypassed?
questions.description: Detailed description of the policy rule or control being excepted
questions.placeholder: Section 4.2: All passwords must be at least 12 characters long

questions.question: What is not being followed?
questions.description: Explanation of what is being bypassed or not implemented
questions.placeholder: Legacy system XYZ can only support 8-character passwords

questions.question: Why is this exception required?
questions.description: Business reason for requiring the exception
questions.placeholder: Upgrading the legacy system would cost $500,000 and take 18 months

questions.question: Which systems or processes are impacted?
questions.description: List of systems or services affected by this exception
questions.placeholder: Legacy payroll system, Employee self-service portal

questions.question: Is this exception temporary or permanent?
questions.description: Duration of the exception

questions.question: How was this exception resolved?
questions.description: Description of how the exception was resolved
questions.placeholder: System was upgraded to support 12-character passwords

questions.question: When was this exception closed?
questions.description: Date when the exception was closed

questions.question: Who verified the closure?
questions.description: Person who verified the exception was properly closed

questions.question: What is the name of your organization?
questions.description: Used to identify the organization requesting the policy exception

questions.question: What is the unique identifier for this exception?
questions.description: Unique ID to track this policy exception

questions.question: What is the name of the policy being excepted?
questions.description: Identifies which organizational policy is being bypassed

questions.question: What version of the policy is being excepted?
questions.description: Version number of the policy document

questions.question: When was the exception requested?
questions.description: Date the exception request was submitted

questions.question: Who requested this exception?
questions.description: Department or individual who requested the exception

questions.question: Who is the responsible owner for this exception?
questions.description: Person responsible for managing and monitoring the exception

questions.question: When is the next review date for this exception?
questions.description: Date when this exception must be reviewed

questions.question: What is the current status of this exception?
questions.description: Current state of the exception request

questions.question: What category of risk does this exception introduce?
questions.description: Primary category of risk introduced

questions.question: What is the potential impact level?
questions.description: Severity of impact if the risk materializes

questions.question: How likely is this risk to occur?
questions.description: Probability of the risk event occurring

questions.question: What is the overall risk rating?
questions.description: Combined assessment of impact and likelihood

questions.question: Describe the risk in detail
questions.description: Detailed explanation of the risk introduced by the exception
questions.placeholder: Shorter passwords increase the risk of brute force attacks...

questions.question: What compensating controls will be implemented?
questions.description: Additional controls to mitigate the exception risk

questions.question: Who are the approvers for this exception?
questions.description: Stakeholders who must approve the exception

questions.question: When does this exception expire?
questions.description: Date when the exception automatically expires

questions.question: How often should this exception be reviewed?
questions.description: Frequency of exception review

questions.question: Is renewal required for this exception?
questions.description: Whether the exception needs to be renewed after expiry
